00026 struct MASK_ITERATOR {
00027     unsigned mask;
00028     unsigned icursor;
00029     enum state { MI_IDLE, MI_STARTED, MI_FINISHED } state;
00030 };
00031 
00032 int hasNext( struct MASK_ITERATOR* it ) {
00033     unsigned next_cursor = 0;
00034 
00035     switch( it->state ){
00036     case MI_IDLE:
00037         next_cursor = 0x80000000;
00038         it->icursor = 31;
00039         break;
00040     case MI_STARTED:
00041         next_cursor = (1 << it->icursor) >> 1;
00042         break;
00043     case MI_FINISHED:
00044         return 0;
00045     }
00046     for ( ; next_cursor != 0; next_cursor >>= 1 ){
00047         if ( it->mask & next_cursor ){
00048             return 1;
00049         }
00050     }
00051     
00052     return 0;
00053 }
00054 int getNext( struct MASK_ITERATOR* it ) {
00055     unsigned next_cursor = 0;
00056 
00057     switch( it->state ){
00058     case MI_IDLE:
00059         next_cursor = 0x80000000;
00060         it->state = MI_STARTED;
00061         it->icursor = 31;
00062         break;
00063     case MI_STARTED:
00064         next_cursor = 1 << --it->icursor;
00065         break;
00066     case MI_FINISHED:
00067         return -1;
00068     }
00069     for ( ; next_cursor != 0; next_cursor >>= 1, --it->icursor ){
00070         if ( it->mask & next_cursor ){
00071             return it->icursor;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     
00075     it->state = MI_FINISHED;
00076     return -1;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081 int acq200_intsDisable( unsigned irqs )
00083 {
00084     struct MASK_ITERATOR it = { irqs };
00085 
00086     while ( hasNext( &it ) ){
00087         disable_irq_nosync( getNext( &it ) );
00088     }
00089 
00090     return 0;
00091 }
00092 int acq200_intsEnable( unsigned irqs )
00094 {
00095     struct MASK_ITERATOR it = { irqs };
00096 
00097     while ( hasNext( &it ) ){
00098         enable_irq( getNext( &it ) );
00099     }
00100 
00101     return 0;
00102 }
